summary: An elderly woman battling Alzheimer's disease agrees to let a film crew document her condition, but what they discover is something far more sinister going on.
cast: Jill Larson|Anne Ramsay|Michelle Ang|Brett Gentile|Jeremy DeCarlos|Ryan Cutrona|Tonya Bludsworth|Anne Bedian|Randell Haynes|Jeffrey Woodard|Julianne Taylor|Dave Blamy|Melissa Lozoff|Bo Keister|Kevin A. title: The Taking
